name: Lily Pad
description: A floating lily pad that moves based on set parameters.

fields.name: Appearance Variable
fields.description: The variable that makes the lily pad appear.

fields.name: Tile Distance
fields.description: The basic tile distance the lily pad moves.

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: The direction the lily pad moves.

fields.name: Swim Speed
fields.description: The speed at which the lily pad moves.

fields.name: Lily Pad Size
fields.description: The size of the lily pad.
